ComicInfo.Summary:
Namesake: When Mac Gargan began his criminal career, he was known as the Scorpion. Now that he is on the cusp of selling his life story to Hollywood, he won't tolerate a female hero using his original alias and diluting his 'brand'.
Born to Rage!: Lyra rejects her mission to collect the seed of this era's greatest "hero", Norman Osborn.
ComicInfo.Title: Namesake; Born to Rage!
